overview:
Vaibhav has experience of more than 19 years in the field of Project Management, Construction Management, Business development and Business Strategies. Vaibhav has worked with Organizations like Reliance Energy (Erstwhile BSES Limited), Essel Group and EMCO Ltd.

Vaibhav has travelled extensively to many European, African and Asian countries in connection with business development activities. Vaibhav has wide experience in both Construction and Power sector. He was instrumental in formation of international Joint Venture, company acquisition, strategic investment deals.

Construction Sector experience includes development of self contained township including amenity building.

Power Sector civil works at 2 x 250 MW Dahanu, 7.5 MW waste heat recovery plant of Monnet Ispat, Raipur, 2 x250 MW BOP of Tau Devilal unit 7 & 8 at Panipat, Haryana.

Vaibhav has travelled across globe and visited more than 16 countries across Europe, Asia and Africa for business development assignments
